name: Yellow Adventure
description:
Yellow Adventure is a story of a yellow ball who wants to go to home, help him to reach the exit point, Although there are many difficulties and hurdles but don't loss heat because yellow ball needs your help.

Complete all levels and prove that you are a real hero

Controls:

Use Arrow keys on Pc to control the ball

Use Left/Right side of screen to control the ball

Please donate it to make is FREE
